name: Duraludon

evolution.description: Duraludon can evolve into Archaludon at level 14 and above with the help of a Metal Alloy. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Alloy Pokémon. Its body resembles polished metal, and it’s both lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that it rusts easily.

abilities.name: Light Metal
abilities.description: This Pokémon is especially light for its species. Once per long rest, it may impose disadvantage on an attack roll against it.

abilities.name: Heavy Metal
abilities.description: This Pokémon is especially heavy. Once per long rest, after being targeted by an attack, it may increase its AC by 2 if it would cause an attack to miss.

abilities.name: Stalwart
abilities.description: This Pokémon may always choose its targets, ignoring the effects of moves that redirect targetting.
